title: 鸡蛋怎么生鸡
author: moneyho9
txt_content: 我把鸡蛋向地下按右键，蛋碎了没鸡，咋办

replies.author: Rear
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Rear 于 2012-1-3 15:42 编辑 

放到发射器里面，发射！具体发射器怎么用请参考[url=http://www.mcbbs.net/http://www.aipai.com/c9/OT47PCckIG8maSA/playerOut.swf]http://www.aipai.com/c9/OT47PCckIG8maSA/playerOut.swf[/url]

replies.author: ayaya
replies.txt_content: 扔的远一点，一定几率出。不要扔到动物上，试过，不行....
